title: Southern Italy
summary: Southern Italy (Italian: Sud Italia; Neapolitan: 'o Sudde; Sicilian: Italia dû Sud), also known as Meridione or Mezzogiorno (Italian pronunciation: [ˌmɛddzoˈdʒorno],[2] literally "Midday";[3][4] in Neapolitan: 'o Miezojuorno; in Sicilian: Mezzujornu), is a macroregion of Italy consisting of the southern half of the Italian state.
